EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-05-08 Pros and Cons of Cloud Service Lock-In.ES- 5/8 Last Chance- Marke
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance! The Pros and Cons of Cloud Service Lock In
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-pros-cons-cloud-lock-in/]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-pros-cons-cloud-lock-in/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
With public cloud and the multicloud gaining momentum, leveraging cloud services is no longer a question of if but when. Are you prepared?
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-pros-cons-cloud-lock-in/]]>
Join our webinar on May 8th as we discuss:
- The benefits and complexities of building next-generation cloud-native apps on cloud services & container technologies - The advantages and drawbacks associated with cloud vendor lock-in. - What architecture is best for your application
Hope to see you there! Register now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-pros-cons-cloud-lock-in/]]> and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card.
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-pros-cons-cloud-lock-in/]]>and we will send you the recording afterward.
